title: TON Surges 13% after Telegram Integrates Blockchain’s Web3 Wallet
description: The TON wallet is now accessible to the Telegram messaging app’s 800 million strong user base, prompting an overnight surge in the token’s price.

title: Zilliqa and Google Cloud unveil game-changing partnership: What you need to know
